Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneticAlgorithm

  • public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Genetic algorithm - Random population of DNA is created, scores assessed, reproduction occurs, and the process continues until a match is found.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ITER 
      static boolean verbose

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      User is asked to enter a population size, crossover rate, mutation rate, algorithm is executed.

      Calculate the minimum edit distance between two strings.

      Method will return a score based on the fitness of a DNA sequence.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        User is asked to enter a population size, crossover rate, mutation rate, algorithm is executed.

      • score

        public static double score(DNA goal,
           DNA individual)
        Method will return a score based on the fitness of a DNA sequence. We want DNA that codes for a protein sequence more similar to our goal to have a higher score. We're using the inverse of the edit distance to do that - although that doesn't seem to be working very well.

      • minDistance

        public static int minDistance(java.lang.String word1,
              java.lang.String word2)
        Calculate the minimum edit distance between two strings.
